entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yorkton Airport 07:05 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing drizzle. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
